properties.address: London Road, King's Lynn, Norfolk PE30 5EZ
properties.description: You can access most Libraries outside staffed hours with “Open Library” providing extra access to the library, its books and computers. Check if it's currently available at your local library at www.norfolk.gov.uk/openlibrary. Free hot drinks available, please see our What’s On page or ask in the library for times: https://www.norfolk.gov.uk/libraries-local-history-and-archives/libraries/whats-on.

properties.description: Space is open to 11 to 25 year olds

properties.address: St. Faith's Community Hub, King's Lynn, Norfolk PE30 4DZ
properties.description: The space is open to all on Wednesday mornings 10am to 12noon. We have free WIFI available, hot drinks, toast & crumpets, biscuits. We want everyone to access a warm and welcoming space, to connect with others, make new friends, and feel part of our local community, so no one has to face poverty or isolation alone.
properties.title: St. Faith's Community Hub

properties.address: North Lynn Church, King's Lynn, Norfolk PE30 2DH
properties.description: We're a community cafe run by volunteers in the heart of North Lynn at the Beacon Church. On Wednesdays and Fridays we also have the Food Hub open.
properties.title: The Beacon Church

properties.address: Trues Yard Fisherfolk Museum, King's Lynn, Norfolk PE30 1QW
properties.description: The Museum's tearoom will be a warm space open five days a week (Tuesday-Saturday 10am-4pm). We have magazines, games & more. This year we will also be introducing our Breakfast Club where anyone who needs it can enjoy a free hot breakfast.
properties.title: True's Yard Fisherfolk Museum (The North End Trust)

properties.address: Lynn Museum, King's Lynn, Norfolk PE30 1NL
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 4th December 2024** Join us for Warm Wednesdays at the Museum, we will be running two sessions from 10.30-12.30 and from 1.30pm-3.30pm every Wednesday from December-March. Come along for a chat, refreshments and enjoy time within our galleries. We look forward to welcoming you!
properties.title: Warm Wednesdays at Lynn Museum
